archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0971
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As Head of Tax I want to know that the new Comarch system will have the functionality to generate buyer-created tax invoices.

properties.value: buyer-created tax invoices to be clarified? Vodafone sells products of suppliers and needs to pay comission. What type of suppliers? Mainly devices, to check if other.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
